channel.title: All 99 in skills cape code [PI]
channel.description:
I have created the completionist cape and the max cape but i need a way to make it so that when one of my players reaches all 99 in all stats except summoning they get max cape but if they get all 99 included summoning they receive completionist cape and max cape the codes for the items are
Completionist cape - 20771 Max cape - 20768
can someone help me with a command for thisits like the command for getting 99 in 1 skill i just dont know how to do it with all skills 99

item.title: All 99 in skills cape code [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

thanks alot worked perfectly i just had to take out the skill [23] and skill [22]
because i dont have any use for those dung and summon pushed to 24 25

item.title: All 99 in skills cape code [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Just make something in DialogueHandler.java just like RS has. For ActionHandler.java, use something like this:

case ####: if(c.playerLevel[1] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[6] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[7] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[8] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[9] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[10] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[11] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[12] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[13] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[14] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[15] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[16] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[17] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[18] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[19] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[20] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[21] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[22] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[23] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[24] >= 99) { c.getShops().openShop(##); } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be maxed in all skills before viewing this shop."); return; } break;

Read full topic
